name: Meka Hunters .io
description:
Meka Hunters is a casual multiplayer Third Person Shooter .io with mechs. Fight other players online in in a free for all semi battle royale match. 

Slightly different rule of Battle Royale; Instead of fighting to be the last one standing, player fights to get to the highest score possible until they died. New player will join in the arena once a player is eliminated. Get to the highest score and stay for as long as you could.

Meka Hunters is a casual game. Enjoy the game stress free without the fear of dropping ranks or levels. start and play the game anytime in the day, or night. just hop in and out. 

Control is very easy to understand. Even babies can play it. So easy, so casual. you can even play it while in bed. Does not need precision aiming or crazy movement skill. stress free.
